skdetail:

Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Connected Smart Life Home Automation and Home Security solution. Connected is a homegrown product of Samslogix. At Samslogix, we build the technology that integrates with our daily life. Our automation and control solutions for buildings and homes let people control entire environments with the push of a button, integrating systems such as A/V, lighting, shading, security, BMS, and HVAC to provide greater comfort, convenience, and security. All of our products are "Connected By Design", built to work together as a complete system, enabling you to monitor, manage, and control everything from one platform.
